item.title: Icons & Web Component
item.description: This is the story of pfe-icon, an icon component I’ve been working on for the PatternFly Elements project. It’s a Web Component for displaying icons, and is compatible with any set of SVG icons. Before the rambling begins, let’s have a demo! .icon-panel { width: 100%; display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(100px, 1fr)); justify-items: center; } body { --pfe-broadcasted--color--text: var(--pbp-fg-color, white); } Red Hat icons:
